title: PBE - Something went wrong (account creation)
body:
Hi, i have a problem with creating my account on the PBE. When i click ''I WANT TO HELP!'' button, It directs me to the ''something went wrong'' page. I would assume that the service is down ATM, and if it is when is it gonna be available again. Or can you check the status of the service?

plez helperino.

replies.body: I haven't heard of any issues with the PBE signup page on EUNE.  Are you still experiencing this issue, and if so can you provide any screenshots and the url of the page you're accessing?  Also, I'm curious if you have a browser or extension issue that might be causing problems.  I recommend trying to access the page through incognito mode or [clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Let me know!

HI i have a problem with pbe signup page on eune , it always says: Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later. I am checking every day and it doesnt work ... i tried clearing out cache and cookies and incognito mode and it still doesnt work ... Please help !!
me too i cant sign up for the same issue can someone help me plz
(sry i'm a bit late on it) I saw your comment on another discussion (PBE) where you putted a link for applying to the PBE, that was just what i needed. Now i'm just waiting to get accepted :/
i cant get on PBE it just brings me to something went wrong page and i see if it fixed 1 a day for 4 days
